name: Can You Beat The Heat?
description:
It's summer! But this is no regular summer as there is a heatwave throughout your country. You need to survive till grandpa's door by finding ice along the way. Can you get there? Play the game to find out! Rules include.....

1. Rectangle (Yellow): Health bar (Start with 100 Health but the Health Bar decreases by 4 every second.)

2. Move character using arrow keys or WASD.

3. All color boundaries are safe. They have a purpose if you click the "see the entire map button" on the win screen. You'll see.

4. If you click the "see entire map button" on the win screen, please answer that question and put it in the chat. 

Now that you have read the directions, go ahead and play the game!
